Title: UglyDolls
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Alison Peck (screenplay by), Robert Rodriguez (story by), Andrea McCarthy Paul (additional writing by), Vivian Wang (additional writing by), Sun-min Kim (based on characters by), David Horvath (based on characters by)
Actors: Pitbull, Ice-T, Kelly Clarkson, Blake Shelton
Plot: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.
